post.description: Invalidate client token (no server state) and log the event.
Update the current user's FCM token.
Add the caller to the waiting list and create a game when ready.
Remove the caller from the waiting list.
Create a new game with the given number of players.

schema.title: Response List Dice Rolls Game  Game Id  Dice Get

get.description:
GET ``/quickplay/`` – return rooms with participant counts.

Optional query parameters ``q``, ``min_stake`` and ``max_stake`` can be used
to filter rooms by ``engine``/``status``/``name`` and stake range.

schema.title: Response List Quick Play Rooms Quickplay Get

post.description:
POST ``/quickplay/create`` – open a room.

Requires ``stake``, ``player_count`` and ``engine`` with an optional
``time_limit``. Returns ``{"room_id": <id>}``.

POST ``/quickplay/{id}/join`` – join a room and pay the stake.

Returns ``{"game_id": <id>, "message": "joined"}`` when a match starts.

schema.title: Response List Participants Quickplay  Room Id  Participants Get

post.description:
POST ``/quickplay/{id}/end`` – declare the winner and close the room.

Returns ``{"pot": <amount>, "status": "closed"}``.

put.description:
PUT ``/quickplay/{id}`` – update room fields.

Accepts any of ``stake``, ``player_count``, ``engine`` or ``time_limit``
and returns the updated room object.

delete.description:
DELETE ``/quickplay/{id}`` – remove a room and its participants.

Returns ``{"message": "deleted"}``.

sends a deposit notification if the user has a registered FCM
token.
